Time Date Converter will let you check time in over 7000 places. It is an excellent tool for everybody who travels a lot, works with international clients or has family/friends abroad. You don\'t even need to know the name of the time zone - just enter a continent/city and the app will find the current time in that place. Converter lets you choose any date/time and convert time form one time zone to another. This app also lets you create a list of your favorite time zones, so you can check time in those places without any hassle - just take one look at the main screen!.
Some of the possible uses include:
» Find the best time to call/meeting/Trip planning your friends/relatives/clients living in a different time zone
» Daylight Saving Time (DST) Switch dates and times
» Holidays and office hours (good, not so good, not good)
» Local Time zone and accepts Present, Past, Future dates
» Current time zone UTC and Global UTC
